about_the_game:
Goblin Down is a short erotic visual novel about losing your sexy goblin wife to an orc.


You are a rookie adventurer who is kidnapped by a goblin tribe. Fortunately you manage to escape with the help of a goblin woman from the tribe.

Several years later you are happily married to Qilka, the very same goblin woman who saved you back in your rookie days. All is well until you find a badly hurt orc on the roadside and bring him back to your home so he can heal up. While you are away from home on more guild assignments your goblin wife is the one taking care of the wounded orc.

Will you notice the change in your wife's behavior before it's too late?


The story is told from the perspective of a professional adventurer (you) and his goblin wife (Qilka). Aside from them the recovering orc Ginug plays a big role.

content_descriptors.notes:
This visual novel contains nudity and sexual content including cheating. It includes depictions of male on female penetration, the consumption of semen, voyeurism and pregnancy.

Parts of the story also include sensitive subjects such as sexual assault, addiction, violence, and betrayal.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i3 or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Goblin Down

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An adult visual novel with a fantasy, goblin, and NTR/netorare (cheating) theme.
